title: Traits: Power, Deceit, Shadows
text: Krognar values freedom and autonomy above all. To his warped mind, the only way one can truly be free is to have the power to crush all who would stand against them. He is known as the Father of Shadows, the Son of Deception, and the Soul of the Forbidden. Krognar is a creature of shadow. His Champions are imbued with the ability to warp across the battlefield. Champions who favour cunning and surprise over brute strength will be rewarded.
